name: Zignaly
public_notice: Zignaly has changed their contract due to the AscendEx hack. Old contract: 0x7bebd226154e865954a87650faefa8f485d36081 New contract: 0xb2617246d0c6c0087f18703d576831899ca94f01. Reference: https://twitter.com/zignaly/status/1470413602247135233

description.en: Zignaly is a social crypto investment platform. Invest in crypto by using signals, copying experts or fully delegated mode with profit sharing (PAMM). Avoid monthly subscriptions and pay only a portion of the profit as success fee.
